column2: Medtronic settles heart valve patent dispute with EdwardsUPDATE 3-Medtronic settles heart valve patent fight with rival Edwards May 20 Medtronic Inc agreed to pay more than $1 billion to rival Edwards Lifesciences Corp to settle patent litigation and keep its CoreValve artificial heart valve on the U.S. market.  UPDATE 3-Medtronic settles heart valve patent fight with rival Edwards May 20 Medtronic Inc agreed to pay more than $1 billion to rival Edwards Lifesciences Corp to settle patent litigation and keep its CoreValve artificial heart valve on the U.S. market. column2: Medtronic settles heart valve patent dispute with EdwardsUPDATE 3-Medtronic settles heart valve patent fight with rival Edwards May 20 Medtronic Inc agreed to pay more than $1 billion to rival Edwards Lifesciences Corp to settle patent litigation and keep its CoreValve artificial heart valve on the U.S. market.  UPDATE 3-Medtronic settles heart valve patent fight with rival Edwards May 20 Medtronic Inc agreed to pay more than $1 billion to rival Edwards Lifesciences Corp to settle patent litigation and keep its CoreValve artificial heart valve on the U.S. market. May 20 Medtronic Inc on Tuesday said it has agreed to pay royalties to rival medical device maker Edwards Lifesciences Corp in a settlement agreement that allows Medtronic to continue to sell its CoreValve replacement heart valves.UPDATE 3-Medtronic settles heart valve patent fight with rival Edwards May 20 Medtronic Inc agreed to pay more than $1 billion to rival Edwards Lifesciences Corp to settle patent litigation and keep its CoreValve artificial heart valve on the U.S. market.
